River Queen attempts to pack a complicated, sweeping, historical narrative into just under two hours. Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie is pale by comparison to more recent Disney fairy tales, thanks to computer graphics. The biggest mistake to my point of view is a pretty traditional one, with regards to storytelling in general, and which are enough to put a film that has achieved its aim and fulfill the expectation of its audience out of the league
